de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.data

Class VectorUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.data.VectorUtil

  • public final class VectorUtil
extends Object
    Utility functions for use with vectors. Note: obviously, many functions are class methods or database related.
    Since:
    0.3
    Author:
    Erich Schubert
